mapper.select: SELECT p.product_seq, p.category_seq, c.category_name, p.sector_seq, p.grade_seq, p.user_seq, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_status, p.register_date, p.update_date, p.product_amount FROM product p inner join category c on p.category_seq = c.category_seq WHERE p.product_status = #{status}
